nodeMetric.field_description: Unsubscribes is the number of users who choose to cancel or not renew their subscription. Reasons typically include: They no longer see value, they have been attracted by the competition, or they feel dissatisfied.

body.summary: Unsubscribes is the number of users who choose to cancel or not renew their subscription. Reasons typically include: They no longer see value, they have been attracted by the competition, or they feel dissatisfied.

field_related_metrics.field_description: The Subscribers metric counts the number of paid or non-paid users who have periodic access to a product or service. Most often, this metric refers to a subscription-based business model, for example, newspapers, magazines, phone, internet service, the use of software-as-a-service (SaaS), or even access to seasonal theatre performance.
Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR) Renewal Rate is the percentage of MRR retained from existing customers, calculated using expansion MRR, downgrades, and cancels.
Logo Churn is the enemy of any subscription company. Logo Churn is the number or percentage of subscribers to a service that discontinue their subscription to that service in a given time period.
